snippet: Erik Ochsner conducted four pianists in “The Rite of Spring” at Le Poisson Rouge, as two percussionists added eerie bells, shivery shimmers and sudden crashes.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews four-piano performance of Stravinsky's The Rite of Spring, conducted by Erik Ochsner at Le Poisson Rouge.
lead_paragraph: Erik Ochsner conducted four pianists in “The Rite of Spring” at Le Poisson Rouge, as two percussionists added eerie bells, shivery shimmers and sudden crashes.

headline.seo: ‘Rite of Spring,’ With Clanging Pianos and Drums
